divs: Sighting DetailsWatching backyard fireworks in the greenbelt. Several others saw it at the same time. Comments like "what the ... is that" and "look at that"
Summary: Drifting south to north at slow speed about 100 ft above ground. Red-orange glow from inside rectangular shape.
